      public String addArtist(String nickname, String cc, String url)
      This method allows to add a new Artis to the arraylist
      Parameters:
      nickname - [It represents the name or nickname of the artist]
      cc - [It represents the id number of ther artist]
      url - [It Contains the image of the artist]
      Returns:
      msj [It contains the massage that says if it was added or not]

    • validateArtistExists

      public int validateArtistExists(String cc)
      This method validates if the artis exists
      Parameters:
      cc - It's the identification of the artist.
      Returns:
      posArtist It contains the position of the artist in the arraylist or -1 if it doesn't exist.

    • addSong

      public String addSong(String artistCc, String name, String url, int duration, String album, double cost, int optionTypeSong)
      This method add a new song to the arraylist of the Artist
      Parameters:
      artistCc - It's the id of the artist
      name - It's the name of the song
      url - It's the url that contains the image of the song
      duration - It contains the duration of the song in seconds
      album - It's the album's name of the song
      cost - The price of the song
      optionTypeSong - It contains the genre of the song
      Returns:
      msj A massage that says if it was added succesfully.

      Returns:
      posCreator It contains the position of the creator in the arraylist or -1 if it doesn't exist.

    • addPodcast

      public String addPodcast(String creatorCc, String name, String url, int duration, String description, int optionTypePodcast)
      This method add a new podcast to the arraylist of the creator
      Parameters:
      creatorCc - It's the id of the artist
      name - It's the name of the song
      url - It's the url that contains the image of the song
      duration - It contains the duration of the song in seconds
      description - It contains the description of the podcast
      optionTypePodcast - It contains the genre of the podcast
      Returns:
      msj A massage that says if it was added succesfully.

    • validateCorrectOption

      public boolean validateCorrectOption(int numprueba)
      This method validates if the answer is between 0 and 3
      Parameters:
      numprueba - it's the user's answer
      Returns:
      isCorrect It's a boolean; true if the answer is between 0 and 3 or False if not.

    • validateCorrectOption2

      public boolean validateCorrectOption2(int numprueba)
      This method does the same than the previous one, exept because it validates if the number is between 1 and 3.
      Parameters:
      numprueba - It's the user's answer.
      Returns:
      isCorrect It's a boolean; true if the answer is between 1 and 3. False if not.
